news.title: 美伊核谈判获“重大进展”，下周继续
news.title0: US-Iran talks end after 'significant progress', mediator says
news.content: 美伊在日内瓦举行核谈判，阿曼外长称取得“重大进展”，双方计划下周在维也纳恢复技术层面会谈。
news.content0: US and Iranian officials have made "significant progress" in high-stakes nuclear talks in Geneva, the Omani foreign minister has said, but the chances of a deal that could avert a war remain unclear.
news.author: BBC

news.title: 美司法部被控隐瞒特朗普关联爱泼斯坦文件
news.title0: US justice department accused of withholding Trump-related Epstein files
news.content: 美国会调查爱泼斯坦案的民主党高层指控司法部隐瞒了包含对特朗普性侵未成年人指控的文件。
news.content0: The top Democrat on the congressional committee investigating Jeffrey Epstein has accused the US justice department of withholding files containing allegations of sexual abuse of a minor made against President Donald Trump.
news.author: BBC

news.title: FBI解雇约10名参与调查特朗普的探员
news.title0: At least 10 FBI agents who worked on Trump investigation fired
news.content: 美国联邦调查局解雇了约10名曾参与调查特朗普处理机密文件案的探员，引发相关协会谴责。
news.content0: The FBI has fired roughly 10 members, all of whom participated in a probe into Donald Trump's handling of classified documents after his first term.
news.author: BBC

news.title: 巴基斯坦称两名士兵在阿塔袭击中身亡
news.title0: Pakistan says two soldiers killed after attacks by Afghan Taliban
news.content: 巴基斯坦称阿富汗塔利班在边境发动袭击，导致两名巴士兵死亡，双方均称给对方造成重大损失。
news.content0: Pakistan says two of its soldiers have been killed after the Afghan Taliban launched an operation against military positions along their shared border late on Thursday.
news.author: BBC

news.title: 丹麦首相因格陵兰问题宣布提前大选
news.title0: Danish PM calls snap election with Greenland issue centre-stage
news.content: 丹麦首相弗雷泽里克森宣布于3月24日提前举行大选，称未来四年对丹麦“至关重要”，格陵兰问题成为焦点。
news.content0: Danish Prime Minister Mette Frederiksen has announced early elections - hailing the next four years as "decisive" for her country.
news.author: BBC

news.title: 研究称人类最早书写或比认知早4万年
news.title0: First writing may be 40,000 years earlier than thought
news.content: 考古学家在德国洞穴发现4.5万年前的猛犸象牙刻痕，认为其信息密度堪比早期文字，或将书写史提前数万年。
news.content0: The history of writing down thoughts and feelings could be tens of thousands of years older than previously believed, surprising archaeologists who made the discovery.
news.author: BBC

news.title: 纽约市长因雪仗事件与警方高层产生分歧
news.title0: A New York City snowball fight gone wrong leaves Mayor Mamdani at odds with police
news.content: 纽约一场雪仗演变为袭警事件，市长称不应起诉参与者，引发警方高层强烈不满，双方关系紧张。
news.content0: What started as an innocent snowball fight during the New York City blizzard has, in fact, snowballed, landing Mayor Zohran Mamdani and the city's police leadership in a row.
news.author: BBC

news.title: 曼迪·摩尔夫妇在洛杉矶山火后重建梦想家园
news.title0: Mandy Moore and Taylor Goldsmith nearly lost their dream home in the LA fires. Here’s how they rebuilt
news.content: 美国女星曼迪·摩尔夫妇在洛杉矶山火中几乎失去梦想家园，目前已完成主屋重建，音乐工作室等仍在施工。
news.content0: In 2020, Mandy Moore and her musician husband Taylor Goldsmith bought their dream home in Altadena, California, as a family of two, hiring a team to begin renovating the romantic Spanish Colonial Revival property and update its 1930s charm. In 2023, as a family of four, with another baby on the way, they moved in and began living their new life in Altadena’s enclave of historic architecture, mountain views and small-town charm.
news.author: CNN

news.title: 英国O2率先接入星链卫星提供移动服务
news.title0: UK connects first mobile network to Elon Musk's Starlink satellites
news.content: 英国移动运营商O2成为首个接入星链卫星的网络，旨在为偏远地区用户在没有4G信号时提供移动数据连接。
news.content0: O2 has become the first mobile network in the UK to switch on user access to satellites, meaning that people living in rural areas with no signal may now be able to connect to mobile data.
news.author: Sky News
